Pre-Game Insights: The Sacramento Kings are on a six-game winning streak, with the coaching change from Mike Brown to Doug Christie unlocking something for this team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Sacramento Kings have gone from having to make up a three-point deficit to being the ones forcing their opponents to be the ones looking to even the score from deep.
The Kings are getting more good and great looks, and they are holding their opponents to fewer, a perfect recipe for success.
If the Kings are able to keep up their improved three-point shooting and defense, they should have no trouble getting back into the playoff picture in the West.
Others: The Sacramento Kings have improved their three-point shooting, with numbers showing they are not only getting more good looks under Christie, but limiting their opponent's quality attempts from deep as well.
